title: Game-Based Learning-Integrated Mathematics Pedagogy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and foundational pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: Supports pre-service and in-service teachers in effectively designing and operating mathematics pedagogical methods within game-based learning environments. Emphasizes learning activities using individual digital devices.

learning_goals: Design a game-based mathematics learning module integrating pre-training videos and real-time cues.
Evaluate the efficiency of game-based tasks by analyzing learners' visual attention levels.
Analyze the impact of game-based instructional methods on understanding mathematical concepts through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
